works.complaint:
The reviews on Boiler Aid all appear fake. Most  
reviewers have reviewed only this company, many of them twice and some  
reviewed also a dentist (coincidently all the same dentist). We had a very
 
bad experience with the company and when posting a negative review where  
threatened with damage to our property. Out of safety reseaons and as  
advised by the police, we took the review off. There is 3 other negative  
reviews. All the rest is most likely fake to push the company's profile.

Regards,
Kristina
